title: Global deaths in violent political conflicts over the long run
subtitle: Data collated from historical records by Peter Brecke. The data seeks to include both combatant and civilian deaths in [violent political conflicts](#dod:violent-political-conflict-catalog) due to fighting, disease, and starvation. But records are incomplete, especially for the distant past and outside of Europe.

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches measure armed conflicts and their deaths?
